description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，正国级领导人，现任中国共产党中央政治局常委、中央书记处书记、中央办公厅主任、中央和国家机关工委书记。被认为是闽江新军的主要成员和习近平的重要亲信。
description.en: Chinese politician, a national-level leader, currently a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, First Secretary of the CCP Central Secretariat, Director of the General Office of the CCP Central Committee, and Secretary of the Central and State Organs Work Committee. He is considered a key member of the Minjiang New Army and a key confidant of Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记，中华人民共和国主席，中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
en: Politburo Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导机构。
description.en: The highest leadership body of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央书记处

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央书记处
en: Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局和中央政治局常务委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The administrative body of the Politburo and its Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会办公厅

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会办公厅
en: General Office of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的办事机构，负责中共中央的日常文秘、机要、信息、调研、安保等工作。
description.en: An administrative body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, responsible for daily secretarial work, confidential matters, information, research, and security for the CCP Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会中央和国家机关工作委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会中央和国家机关工作委员会
中央和国家机关工作委员会
en: Central and State Organs Work Committee of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的派出机构，领导中央和国家机关的党的工作。
description.en: A dispatched agency of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, leading the party work in central and state organs.

nodes.id: 中国共产党北京市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党北京市委员会
en: Beijing Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

nodes.id: 中国共产党浙江省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党浙江省委员会
en: Zhejiang Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

nodes.id: 中央国家安全委员会办公室

zh-cn: 中央国家安全委员会办公室
en: Office of the Central National Security Commission

description.zh-cn: 中央国家安全委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The administrative body of the Central National Security Commission.

en: Central Party School of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党培养高级领导干部的学校。
description.en: The school for training senior leaders of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国福建省三明市代管的县级市，为蔡奇的出生地。
description.en: A county-level city administered by Sanming, Fujian Province, People's Republic of China, and the birthplace of Cai Qi.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央书记处书记，蔡奇是其该职务的继任者。
description.en: Chinese politician, former First Secretary of the CCP Central Secretariat, succeeded by Cai Qi.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央办公厅主任、中央和国家机关工委书记，蔡奇是其这两个职务的继任者。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the General Office of the CCP Central Committee and Secretary of the Central and State Organs Work Committee, succeeded in both roles by Cai Qi.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共北京市委书记，蔡奇是其继任者。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Party Secretary of Beijing, succeeded by Cai Qi.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，蔡奇的中共北京市委书记职务继任者。
description.en: Chinese politician, who succeeded Cai Qi as Party Secretary of Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任北京市市长，蔡奇是其继任者。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Mayor of Beijing, succeeded by Cai Qi.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，蔡奇的北京市市长职务继任者。
description.en: Chinese politician, who succeeded Cai Qi as Mayor of Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任国务院总理。蔡奇曾在其担任浙江省省长期间任其副手。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Premier of the State Council. Cai Qi served as his deputy when he was Governor of Zhejiang.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在蔡奇任中共浙江省委组织部部长期间，曾任浙江省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, who served as Party Secretary of Zhejiang while Cai Qi was the head of the provincial Organization Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在蔡奇任中共浙江省委组织部部长期间，曾任浙江省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, who served as Party Secretary of Zhejiang while Cai Qi was the head of the provincial Organization Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在蔡奇任杭州市市长期间，曾任杭州市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, who served as Party Secretary of Hangzhou while Cai Qi was the city's mayor.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，蔡奇在其担任福建省委书记期间曾任其秘书。
description.en: Chinese politician, for whom Cai Qi served as a secretary during his tenure as Party Secretary of Fujian.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在蔡奇任衢州市市长期间，曾任衢州市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, who served as Party Secretary of Quzhou while Cai Qi was the city's mayor.

description.zh-cn: 第24届冬季奥林匹克运动会。时任北京市委书记的蔡奇作为奥组委主席，主导了此次运动会的筹办工作。
description.en: The XXIV Olympic Winter Games. As President of the Organizing Committee, then-Beijing Party Secretary Cai Qi led the preparations for the games.

nodes.id: 2017年北京安全隐患排查整改行动

zh-cn: 2017年北京安全隐患排查整改行动

description.zh-cn: 由时任北京市委书记蔡奇主导，在大兴“11·18”火灾后于北京全市范围内开展的安全隐患大排查、大清理、大整治专项行动。该行动因在寒冬中导致大量外来务工人员被强制搬离而引发争议，被批评为“清理低端人口”。
description.en: A special campaign of large-scale safety hazard investigation, clearance, and rectification conducted throughout Beijing, led by then-Party Secretary Cai Qi following the Daxing '11.18' fire. The campaign was controversial for forcing a large number of migrant workers from their homes in the cold winter and was criticized as an effort to 'clear out the low-end population'.

location.zh-cn: 北京市大兴区西红门镇

description.zh-cn: 2017年11月18日发生于北京市大兴区的一起重大火灾事故，造成19人死亡。该事件直接促使北京市领导层发起为期40天的安全隐患大排查大清理大整治专项行动。
description.en: A major fire incident that occurred on November 18, 2017, in Daxing District, Beijing, resulting in 19 deaths. The event directly prompted Beijing's leadership to launch a 40-day special campaign for large-scale investigation, clearance, and rectification of safety hazards.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任南投县县长。蔡奇在2012年访问台湾时曾与其会面，并称其为“老朋友”。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, former Magistrate of Nantou County. Cai Qi met with him during a visit to Taiwan in 2012 and referred to him as an 'old friend'.

description.zh-cn: 蔡奇之子，毕业于浙江大学，任职于中华人民共和国国家发展和改革委员会。
description.en: Son of Cai Qi, a graduate of Zhejiang University, who works at the National Development and Reform Commission of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国家发展和改革委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家发展和改革委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管宏观调控和经济社会发展规划的组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for macroeconomic management and planning for economic and social development.

description.zh-cn: 对中华人民共和国最高领导人习近平在福建省任职期间（1985年至2002年）的旧部、同僚、朋友等的称呼，被视为习近平派系的一部分。
description.en: A term referring to the former subordinates, colleagues, and friends of paramount leader Xi Jinping during his tenure in Fujian Province (1985-2002), considered part of the Xi Jinping faction.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的议事协调机构，负责国家安全工作的顶层设计和决策。
description.en: A policy formulation and coordination body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, responsible for top-level design and decision-making on national security work.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任全国人大常委会委员长，与蔡奇同为中央国家安全委员会副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, who serves alongside Cai Qi as a Vice Chairman of the Central National Security Commission.

description.zh-cn: 蔡奇于1955年12月5日出生于福建省永安县（今永安市）。
description.en: Cai Qi was born on December 5, 1955, in Yong'an County (modern-day Yong'an City), Fujian Province.

description.zh-cn: 蔡奇长期在福建、浙江与习近平有共事经历，被认为是习近平派系“闽江新军”的主要成员和其重要亲信。在习近平担任中共浙江省委书记期间，蔡奇是其下属。习近平执政后，蔡奇获得快速提拔。
description.en: Cai Qi had a long history of working with Xi Jinping in Fujian and Zhejiang and is considered a key member of Xi's political faction, the 'Minjiang New Army,' and a key confidant. During Xi Jinping's tenure as Party Secretary of Zhejiang, Cai Qi was his subordinate. After Xi Jinping came to power, Cai Qi was rapidly promoted.

description.zh-cn: 蔡奇被认为是闽江新军的主要成员。
description.en: Cai Qi is considered a key member of the Minjiang New Army.

degree.zh-cn: 政治教育系学士、经济法律学院硕士、政治经济学博士
degree.en: Bachelor's in Political Education, Master's from the School of Economics and Law, PhD in Political Economy

description.zh-cn: 1975年作为工农兵学员进入福建师范大学政治教育系学习，后在该校获得硕士和博士学位。
description.en: Entered Fujian Normal University's Department of Political Education as a Worker-Peasant-Soldier student in 1975, and later obtained master's and doctoral degrees from the university.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
中国共产党中央书记处
中国共产党中央委员会办公厅
中国共产党中央委员会中央和国家机关工作委员会
中国共产党北京市委员会
中国共产党浙江省委员会
中央国家安全委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 在李强任浙江省省长期间，蔡奇担任其常务副省长，是其副手。
description.en: While Li Qiang was Governor of Zhejiang, Cai Qi served as the Executive Vice Governor, his deputy.

description.zh-cn: 在赵洪祝任中共浙江省委书记期间，蔡奇担任省委组织部长。
description.en: While Zhao Hongzhu was Party Secretary of Zhejiang, Cai Qi served as the head of the provincial Organization Department.

description.zh-cn: 在夏宝龙任中共浙江省委书记期间，蔡奇担任省委组织部长。
description.en: While Xia Baolong was Party Secretary of Zhejiang, Cai Qi served as the head of the provincial Organization Department.

description.zh-cn: 在黄坤明任中共杭州市委书记期间，蔡奇担任杭州市市长。
description.en: While Huang Kunming was Party Secretary of Hangzhou, Cai Qi served as the city's Mayor.

position.en: Secretary to the Provincial Party Secretary

description.zh-cn: 在陈光毅任中共福建省委书记期间，蔡奇担任其正处级秘书。
description.en: While Chen Guangyi was Party Secretary of Fujian, Cai Qi served as his director-level secretary.

description.zh-cn: 在茅临生任中共衢州市委书记期间，蔡奇担任衢州市市长。
description.en: While Mao Linsheng was Party Secretary of Quzhou, Cai Qi served as the city's Mayor.

description.zh-cn: 蔡奇在担任中共北京市委书记期间，兼任北京冬奥组委主席，主导并成功举办了2022年北京冬奥会。
description.en: During his tenure as Party Secretary of Beijing, Cai Qi concurrently served as President of the Beijing Winter Olympics Organizing Committee, leading and successfully hosting the 2022 Beijing Winter Olympics.

relationships.target: 2017年北京安全隐患排查整改行动

description.zh-cn: 在2017年北京大兴火灾后，时任北京市委书记蔡奇下令并主导了为期40天的全市安全隐患大排查大清理大整治专项行动。
description.en: Following the 2017 Beijing Daxing fire, then-Beijing Party Secretary Cai Qi ordered and led a 40-day city-wide special campaign for large-scale investigation, clearance, and rectification of safety hazards.

relationships.target: 2017年北京安全隐患排查整改行动

description.zh-cn: 2017年北京大兴火灾的发生直接促使北京市领导层发起了此次专项行动，以彻底消除安全隐患。
description.en: The occurrence of the 2017 Beijing Daxing fire directly prompted Beijing's leadership to launch this special campaign to completely eliminate safety hazards.

description.zh-cn: 蔡奇在2012年7月访问台湾期间，与时任南投县长李朝卿会面，并称其为“老朋友”。
description.en: During his visit to Taiwan in July 2012, Cai Qi met with then-Nantou County Magistrate Lee Chao-ching and referred to him as an 'old friend'.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国家发展和改革委员会

description.zh-cn: 尹力接替蔡奇担任中共北京市委书记。
description.en: Yin Li succeeded Cai Qi as Party Secretary of Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 蔡奇接替郭金龙担任中共北京市委书记。
description.en: Cai Qi succeeded Guo Jinlong as Party Secretary of Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 蔡奇接替王沪宁担任中共中央书记处排名第一的书记。
description.en: Cai Qi succeeded Wang Huning as the first-ranked Secretary of the CCP Central Secretariat.

description.zh-cn: 蔡奇接替丁薛祥担任中共中央办公厅主任及中央和国家机关工委书记。
description.en: Cai Qi succeeded Ding Xuexiang as Director of the General Office of the CCP Central Committee and Secretary of the Central and State Organs Work Committee.
